item.title: Report X-2023080543
item.description:
Report X-2023080543

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-31
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped causing the contents to be crushed, dented and to rip which allowed liquid to leak wetting and staining the contents and carton. Upon discovery of the pkg leaking it was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: There is a small tear, less than 1/16" in the side of 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle where the taper of the top of the bottle meets the side wall. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023080542
item.description:
Report X-2023080542

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-31
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped during sortation causing damage to the contents. Released liquid contained inside carton. Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin upon discovery and sent to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Friction lids with no safety clips on 4 x 1 gal paint cans failed due to dented cans. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.
